info.title: Points of Interest
info.description:
# Introduction

The Points of Interest API by AVUXI TopPlace™ returns the popular places within the
requested geographical area.

For each place, the underlying algorithm analyzes feedback from different
online media sources into a human understandable number to measure the
popularity of that place. A place can be categorized in one of the following 6
categories: Sights, Beach/Park, Historical, Nightlife, Restaurant and Shopping.

# Limitations

This algorithm will not favor the most traveled or exclusive venues, but rather
favors venues that have left a very positive impression on people.

# Authorization

Before using the API you will need to get an access token. Please read our
**[Authorization Guide](https://developers.amadeus.com/self-service/apis-docs/guides/authorization)** for more information on how to get your token.

# Supported Operations

Resource: location

HTTP Method: GET

1.1: Add an id, self and rank to location resource
add filter parameter for search operation
1.0.2: New by-square endpoint as secondary resource
1.0.1: Move from PointOfInterst to Location definition

get.summary: Returns points of interest for a given location and radius.

parameters.name: radius
parameters.description: radius of the search in Kilometer. Can be from 0 to 20, default value is 1 Km.

get.summary: Retieve one point of interest by its Id.
get.description:
Returns a single Point of Interest from a given id. ### Request example: 
   GET https://test.api.amadeus.com/v1/reference-data/locations/pois/9CB40CB5D0
### Request example: 

{
  "data": {
    "type": "location",
    "subType": "POINT_OF_INTEREST",
    "id": "9CB40CB5D0",
    "self": {
        "href": "https://test.api.amadeus.com/v1/reference-data/locations/pois/9CB40CB5D0",
        "methods": [
            "GET"
        ]
    },
    "geoCode": {
        "latitude": 41.39165,
        "longitude": 2.164772
    },
    "name": "Casa Batlló",
    "category": "SIGHTS",
    "rank": 1,
    "tags": [
        "sightseeing",
        "sights",
        "museum",
        "landmark",
        "tourguide",
        "restaurant",
        "attraction",
        "activities",
        "commercialplace",
        "shopping",
        "souvenir"
    ]
  }
}

get.summary: Returns points of interest for a given area

parameters.name: north
parameters.description: Latitude north of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: west
parameters.description: Longitude west of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: south
parameters.description: Latitude south of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

parameters.name: east
parameters.description: Longitude east of bounding box (decimal coordinates)

tags.description: list of tags related to the location

rank.description: the rank is the position compared to other locations based on how famous is a place. 1 being the highest.

errors.title: NOT FOUND
errors.detail: no response found for this query parameter

status.description: the HTTP status code applicable to this error

title.description: a short summary of the error

source.title: Issue_Source
source.description: an object containing references to the source of the error

pointer.description: a JSON Pointer [RFC6901] to the associated entity in the request document

parameter.description: a string indicating which URI query parameter caused the issue

example.description: a string indicating an example of the right value

pageOffset.name: page[offset]
pageOffset.description: start index of the requested page

categories.name: categories
categories.description:
category of the location. 

Multiple value can be selected using a comma i.e. SIGHTS, SHOPPING

400.description:
code    | title                                 
------- | ------------------------------------- 
477     | INVALID FORMAT
572     | INVALID OPTION
4926    | INVALID DATA RECEIVED               
32171   | MANDATORY DATA MISSING
